messages.title: GET BREXIT DONE
messages.content: It's time to get Brexit done so we can focus on our other priorities. For too long the opposition parties have blocked legislation for us to leave the EU. Only the Conservative Party can deliver Brexit with a majority government.

messages.title: TURBOCHARGE OUR ECONOMY
messages.content: To grow our economy and help business, we need to reduce business rates and improve our infrastructure. New developments are being built with no thought to the impact they will have on already busy roads. We need to change this.

messages.title: MORE POLICE
messages.content: Crime is too high in Cardiff. We are already seeing more police being recruited, and we need to give them the tools they need to stop crimes like County Lines Drug gangs, which blight our community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The candidate proposes that Brexit should be delivered swiftly to focus on other priorities, criticizing opposition parties for blocking legislation.
The candidate suggests reducing business rates and improving infrastructure to grow the economy.
The candidate highlights the need for more police recruitment and better tools to tackle crime in Cardiff, specifically mentioning County Lines Drug gangs.
